fields.plot: A chronicle of the childhood, adolescence and burgeoning adulthood of a young, African-American, gay man growing up in a rough neighborhood of Miami.

fields.title: Lost in Translation
fields.actors: Scarlett Johansson, Bill Murray, Akiko Takeshita, Kazuyoshi Minamimagoe
fields.plot: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

fields.title: The Lives of Others
fields.actors: Martina Gedeck, Ulrich Mühe, Sebastian Koch, Ulrich Tukur
fields.plot: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

fields.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
fields.writer: Du Lu Wang (book), Hui-Ling Wang (screenplay), James Schamus (screenplay), Kuo Jung Tsai (screenplay)
fields.actors: Yun-Fat Chow, Michelle Yeoh, Ziyi Zhang, Chen Chang
fields.plot: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

fields.title: Boyhood
fields.actors: Ellar Coltrane, Patricia Arquette, Elijah Smith, Lorelei Linklater
fields.plot: The life of Mason, from early childhood to his arrival at college.

fields.title: Manchester by the Sea
fields.actors: Casey Affleck, Ben O'Brien, Kyle Chandler, Richard Donelly
fields.plot: A depressed uncle is asked to take care of his teenage nephew after the boy's father dies.

fields.title: The Pianist
fields.actors: Adrien Brody, Emilia Fox, Michal Zebrowski, Ed Stoppard
fields.plot: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

fields.title: Ex Machina
fields.actors: Domhnall Gleeson, Alicia Vikander, Oscar Isaac, Sonoya Mizuno
fields.plot: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breath-taking humanoid A.I.

fields.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
fields.writer: James Gunn, Nicole Perlman, Dan Abnett (based on the Marvel comics by), Andy Lanning (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Mantlo (character created by: Rocket Raccoon), Keith Giffen (character created by: Rocket Raccoon), Jim Starlin (characters created by: Drax the Destroyer,  Gamora & Thanos), Steve Englehart (character created by: Star-Lord), Steve Gan (character created by: Star-Lord), Steve Gerber (character created by: Howard the Duck), Val Mayerik (character created by: Howard the Duck)
fields.actors: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista, Vin Diesel
fields.plot: A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

fields.title: The Departed
fields.writer: William Monahan (screenplay), Alan Mak, Felix Chong
fields.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson, Mark Wahlberg
fields.plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

fields.title: The Godfather
fields.writer: Mario Puzo (screenplay by), Francis Ford Coppola (screenplay by), Mario Puzo (based on the novel by)
fields.actors: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Richard S. Castellano
fields.plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

fields.title: Finding Nemo
fields.writer: Andrew Stanton (original story by), Andrew Stanton (screenplay by), Bob Peterson (screenplay by), David Reynolds (screenplay by)
fields.actors: Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe
fields.plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

fields.title: Nightcrawler
fields.actors: Jake Gyllenhaal, Michael Papajohn, Marco Rodríguez, Bill Paxton
fields.plot: When Louis Bloom, a con man desperate for work, muscles into the world of L.A. crime journalism, he blurs the line between observer and participant to become the star of his own story.
